content.question: Directions: You will participate in a simulated conversation. You will hear a series of 6 questions or statements; after each question or statement, it is your turn to speak. You will have 20 seconds to record each response. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Zhang Siyuan, a Chinese artist visiting your school, about his perspectives on arts in the curriculum. Prompt 1

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
